name: Liviu Iancu
tagline: Testing and learning Javascript with Angular.js
body:
![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/LiviuLvu/LiviuLvu.github.io/master/images/frontcrash.jpg)

## Welcome to my GitHub Test Pages
Below is a list of web apps built according to exercises and tutorials.
Left side is the app name. Right side shows the languages and libraries used to build the app.

## View tests and tutorials written with angular.js

* [Outbox2 --- routing, angular.js, bootstrap, custom css]
    (https://liviuLvu.github.io/codeacademy/outbox2)
* [Reader --- routing, angular.js, bootstrap, custom css]
    (https://liviuLvu.github.io/codeacademy/reader)
* [Calendar --- routing, angular.js, bootstrap, custom css]
    (https://liviuLvu.github.io/codeacademy/calendar)
* [Front page --- html, css, bootstrap]
    (https://liviuLvu.github.io/codeacademy/airbnb_website)
* [Table, Calculating total price --- angular js]
    (http://liviulvu.github.io/calculate_total_price/)
* [Button hides text --- angular.js, bootstrap]
    (http://liviulvu.github.io/isolated_scope_directive/)
* [Movie list, sortable, with add function --- angular.js]
    (http://liviulvu.github.io/movie_list_sortable_add/)
* [Menu Bar --- angular.js]
    (http://liviulvu.github.io/nav_menu/)
* [Search functionality --- angular.js]
    (http://liviulvu.github.io/search_simple_example/)
* [Form updates data displayed, reset form --- angular.js]
    (http://liviulvu.github.io/form_update_data/)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
